item.title: Abrasion Test
item.description: Draft: I like illustrations and posters. About their punchiness. Oil painting needs conscious effort to be as punchy. How I tried to make it work: finelining and calligraphy. Are brush strokes and brush blends hidden? Abrasion Test - oil on paper, 30 cm x 40 cm. Instagram link
